reviewText: I enjoy this workout series, and feel benefit from it.  As the headline says, it is easy to  follow the exercises.
Great response from your seller.  This work out is a great one for those just starting out. Even if you have never done any type of exercise.
I recently bought the system that goes with this video and have enjoyed both the system and this video.  It is easy and fun to do and does not take a lot of time.  Very easy to follow.
